ygData.subject: Re: General grousing
ygData.msgSnippet: Okay so now you have me confused. are you complaining that you are RPing and they are not or that you need to wirk to get to cash to buy this? it is your
ygData.messageBody:
Okay so now you have me confused. are you complaining that you are RPing and
they are not or that you need to wirk to get to cash to buy this? it is your
choice to play how you want and thier choice to play as they wish. so what
are you really complaining about?


Kizmet Bayashi
Monk of the 46th ....
E-Marr
Da`Kor



----- Original Message -----
From: James W Hooper <jhooper@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, December 08, 1999 2:03 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] General grousing


> From: James W Hooper <jhooper@...>
>
> At 03:13 PM 12/08/1999 -0800, you wrote:
> >From: "Tim Perkins" <tperkins@...>
> >
> >Shando,
> >
> >No I dont see a problem with this but if you wish to RP your monk maybe
you
> >should not buy anything but only use what items you loot yourself. this
way
> >you would not have to save up so much money. Another thoguht is that
those
> >bracers come off of a difficult Mob in Lguk. at level 16 you werent
> >"supposed" to have those. Back at level 16 when E-marr was still new and
the
> >highest playes were only in there low 30's noone had those bracers.
People
> >on the server didnt even know where they came from. I Think I was wearing
> >woven still at that point. dont dispair because you dont have level 30
> >equipment at level 16. you will get it eventually.
> >
> >Kizmet Bayashi
> >Monk of the 46th ....
> >E-Marr
> >Da`Kor
> >
> >"Good things come to those monks who wait"
>
> But the problem is that there are those at my level or close to it who
> *can* afford this stuff. Why, because they have been killing and looting
> and I have been RPing.
>
> Shando, 16th circle Silent Fist Clan
> Bertoxxulous
>
> >
